謻謻謻

謻字的基本解释

謻
yí
〔謻门〕a.古代冰室门名，如“謻謻曲榭。”b.古代宫殿的侧门，如“未央朝寂，謻謻旦空。”

謻字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yí］［chí］
［《廣韻》弋支切，平支，以。］
［《集韻》陳知切，平支，澄。］
亦作“誃1”。
(1)离别；脱离。
(2)同“簃”。于省吾有《双剑誃诸子新证》。
(3)见“謻門”。

謻字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　謻； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页1178第26
【廣韻】弋支切【集韻】余支切，?音移。與誃同。凡門堂臺榭別出者曰謻。周有謻臺。詳前誃字註。又【石林燕語】東華門直北有東向門，與內東門相值，謂之謻門，無榜。王伯厚曰：謻門，始標額於熙寧十年。【晉書載記·劉曜傳】謻門旦空。【註】謂別門也。又【唐書·韋弘機傳】列岸謻廊亘王城外。又【陸雲·與兄書】折其謻堂。又曹公有謻塘。【劉孝綽詩】反景照謻塘。　又【埤蒼】冰室門名。【張衡·東京賦】謻門曲榭，邪阻城洫。【文選註】冰室門也。【廣韻】與?同。　又諸蠻州名。【唐書·地理志】劒南道有謻羅州。　又人名。【宋史·宗室表】右侍禁士謻。　又【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】??知切，音馳。又【集韻】敞尒切，音侈。?與誃同。【陸雲·與兄書】坼其謻堂。

謻字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
謻字的起名意思

暂无。

謻
Basic explanation of words
謻
yí
〔謻門] a. The name of the ancient ice room gate, such as "謻謻 Quxie." b. The side door of an ancient palace, such as "Weiyang Chaoji, Fuyu Dankong."
謻
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yí］［chí］
["Guangyun" Yi branch cut, flat branch, to. ]
["Ji Yun" Chen Zhiqie, flat branch, clear. ]
Also known as "誃1".
(1) Parting; leaving.
(2) Same as "簃". Yu Xingwu has "New Proof of Two Swords".
(3) See "謻门".
謻
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 1] [Words Department] 　謻; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 1178 Page 26
【Guangyun】Yi branch cut 【Jiyun】The remaining branch cut, sound shifted. The same as the plaque. Those who do not come out of all doors and halls are called 謻. Zhou Youfutai. Detailed note before transcript. Also [Shilin Yanyu] Donghuamen has Dongxiangmen straight to the north, which is equal to the inner Dongmen. Wang Bohou said: "Fujimen" started bidding in Xining ten years ago. [Jin Book Collection·Liu Yao Biography] Fumen Dankong. [Note] Said another door. Also [Tang Shu·Wei Hongji Biography] Lie An Fu Lang outside the city of King Gen. Also 【Lu Yun·Book with Brother】Zheqifutang. And Cao Gong has Futang. 【Liu Xiaochuo Poems】Reverse the scene and photograph the pond.　[Pi Cang] The name of the door of the ice room. [Zhang Heng·Tokyo Fu] Fumen Quxie, evil block city Xia. [Annotation to the text] The door to the ice room. [Guang Yun] Same as?　The names of the various states. [Book of Tang·Geography] There is Wanluozhou on the South Road.　Another name. [Song History · Clan Table] The right servant of the imperial prince 謻.　[Jiyun] [Rhyme] [Zhengyun]?? Knowing and cutting, Yinchi. Also 【Jiyun】open and cut, the sound is extravagant. ? Same as plenum. [Lu Yun·Book with Brother] Qiqitangtang.
謻

謻
Name meaning
Nothing.
yí, chǐ
только в сочетаниях (см. ниже) и собственных именах; также вм. 誃
